title: Logo font seems like Parisian but not the same. Could you help me please ?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822152719im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fileuse-arvor_6086.jpg)
  
I'm looking for the font for logo "Fileuse d'Arvor". It seems like "Parisian" or "Peignot" but it's not the same. Could you help me to find it please ? Thank you very much !

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fileuse-arvor.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822152719/http:/typophile.com/files/fileuse-arvor.jpg) | 118.16 KB |
author: David Charreteur

comments.content:
Looks like the sort of hand-drawn advertising script common through the 1950s. Most likely not an actual font.

None of the following are close matches, but have some of the feel of the original:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/sympathique/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822152719/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/sympathique/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/sympathique/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/curly-lady/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822152719/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/curly-lady/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/curly-lady/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/cadson-demak/kurry/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822152719/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/cadson-demak/kurry/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/cadson-demak/kurry/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typejockeys/carabelle/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822152719/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typejockeys/carabelle/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typejockeys/carabelle/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/odette/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822152719/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/odette/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/odette/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/monte-carlo-script-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822152719/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/monte-carlo-script-nf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/monte-carlo-script-nf/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/northernblock/regan-alt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822152719/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/northernblock/regan-alt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/northernblock/regan-alt/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/alive-fonts/ovoda/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822152719/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/alive-fonts/ovoda/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/alive-fonts/ovoda/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/latinotype/kahlo/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822152719/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/latinotype/kahlo/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/latinotype/kahlo/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sideshow/fuzzbox/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822152719/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sideshow/fuzzbox/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sideshow/fuzzbox/")

Thank you for your answer,  
I will use Illustrator to make the same font I think.
